title: Dream up at The Ava Lounge
description:
The Ava Lounge, named for Ava Gardner, boasts 1950s retro and French Riviera touches. 

World class drinks with a world class view from the 14th floor, and twenty-two varieties of single malt scotch to try.

title: Something Different's Up Every Night at Bar 13
description:
Bar 13 is New York City's anytime destination for dressed down relaxation, dance-til-you-drop parties, and a touch of retro-cool. 

Located just off of historic Union Square, different events every night offer something for everyone - poetry, metal, reggae, house, and more are hosted at this two-floor bar and club. 

If you're looking to relax try out the rooftop deck with palm trees, low-lighting, and gorgeous views of the Manhattan skyline. Two-for-one after-work drink specials and one of the best stocked bars in the city only serve to sweeten the deal.

title: Imbibe Al Fresco at Berry Park
description:
With 15 taps dedicated to imported beers, mostly Belgian and German brews, those looking for choices from nearby Brooklyn brewery will be disappointed.

A 13 foot wide TV screen is big enough for the most picky soccer fan.

Take a selfie with breathtaking view of the Manhattan skyline as your backdrop.

This is a cash only establishment - be prepared as credit cards are not accepted.

title: Make a Note of Bookmarks Lounge
description:
Enjoy a cocktail on the 14th floor of the Library Hotel in style. Bookmarks Rooftop Lounge is a small intimate bar, that has an amazing view of all that is going on in New York City. 

This lounge is large enough to bring a group of friends to, but small enough to have that lounge feel. Get there in time to have a drink while watching the sun set!

title: Make like Gossip Girl at the Empire Hotel
location: The Empire Hotel 44 West 63rd Street, New York NY 10023
description:
On the West 63rd Street between two legendary New York City landmarks - Lincoln Center and Central Park - this boutique NYC hotel provides luxury accommodations overlooking the Broadway / Columbus Avenue gateway to the Upper West Side. 

The roof top is on the 12th floor - take in the sights with a drink on your hand.
